article:
UK fan club]] A 'fan club' is a group that is dedicated to a well-known person,
 group, idea (such as history) or sometimes even an inanimate object (such as a
 famous building). Most fan clubs are run by fans who devote considerable time
 and resources to supporting them. There are also "official" fan clubs that are
 run by someone associated with the person or organization the club is centered
 around. This is the case for many musicians, sports teams and more.
